T02D1229:37a-3: de kho na nyid bcu pa /
T02D1229:37a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1229:37a-5: dpal ldan he ru ka dang bla ma la //
T02D1229:37a-6: gus pas phyag byas dgyes pa'i rdo rje las //
T02D1229:37a-7: gsungs pa'i de kho na nyid bcu pa las //

T02D1229:37a-9: bsrung ba dbang bskur gtor ma bzlas dgar dang //
T02D1229:37a-10: phyir bzlog pa dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang //
T02D1229:37a-11: bsdigs sbyor ba dang gshegs su gsol ba ste //
T02D1229:37a-12: de nyid bcu zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D1229:37a-13: de la don ni 'di yin te /

T02D1229:37a-15: pam ser po'i sa bon las byung ba'i sna tshogs
T02D1229:37a-16: padma la / yi ge ram las skyes pa'i nyi
T02D1229:37a-17: ma la gnas pa'i sa bon bhr'u% ser po de

T02D1229:37a-19: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i lte ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1229:37a-20: yi ge h'um sngon po de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1229:37a-21: las rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D1229:37a-22: cho ga bzhin du sa bon gyi yi ge h'u%
T02D1229:37a-23: bcu rtsibs bcu la gnas pa de las skyes pa'i
T02D1229:37a-24: khro bo bcu po yin no //
T02D1229:37a-25: de la shar gyi rtsibs la gshin rje gshed sngon po thob pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1229:37a-26: lho'i rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po be con dkar po 'chang ba'o //
T02D1229:37a-27: nub kyi rtsibs la padma mthar byed dmar po padma dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1229:37a-28: byang gi rtsibs la bgegs mthar byed nag po rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1229:37a-29: dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la 'dod pa'i rgyal po nag po lcag skyu 'chang ba'o //
T02D1229:37a-30: me'i rtsibs la dbyug pa sngon po phyag na dbyug pa nag po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1229:37a-31: bden bral gyi rtsibs la stobs po che nag po phyag na rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1229:37a-32: rlung gi rtsibs la mi g-yo ba ral gri nag po 'chang ba'o //
T02D1229:37a-33: steng gi rtsibs la gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D1229:37a-34: rnam par snang mdzad gyi cod pan can 'khor lo

T02D1229:37b-4: po bsnams pa'o // // shar la sogs pa'i khro

T02D1229:37b-10: la sogs pa na bzhugs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po

T02D1229:37b-14: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'od dpag med dang /
T02D1229:37b-15: don yod grub pa'i cod pan can dag yin no //
T02D1229:37b-16: khro bo thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste /
T02D1229:37b-17: g-yon gyi mdzub mo dag ni sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1229:37b-18: g-yas pa rnams ni rang gi phyag mtshan 'chang ba'o //
T02D1229:37b-19: khro ba dang bcas pa'i zhal gdong zlum la dmar
T02D1229:37b-20: ba skra ser ba gyen du brdzes pa khro bo

T02D1229:37b-27: bgegs mthar byed dag ni sbom la gsus pa 'phyang ba sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1229:37b-28: smin ma ser ba gyen du brdzes pa yin la /

T02D1229:37b-30: da ni dbang bskur ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1229:37b-31: go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su dkyil 'khor byas la /
T02D1229:37b-32: dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor la bcug pa /
T02D1229:37b-35: dregs pa chud zad med pa /
T02D1229:37b-36: gzhan la dad pa med pa /
T02D1229:37b-37: shin tu dad pas blta ba /
T02D1229:37b-39: rdo rje dang bdag po la sogs pa bdun pos
T02D1229:37b-40: dbang bskur ba'i slob ma la cho ga bzhin du
T02D1229:37b-41: gsang ba'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1229:37b-42: de'i rjes la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyi cho ga dang ldan pa bdun po dang /
T02D1229:37b-43: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa shes rab ye shes la sems rab tu dga' ba /
T02D1229:37b-44: shes rab dang sbyor ba bde ba'i brdas bstan pa

T02D1229:38a-1: rab yang dag par gtad pa blangs pa'i bde ba'i
T02D1229:38a-2: brda gang yin pa de ni shes rab ye shes
T02D1229:38a-4: de nas kyang 'og tu bla ma dam pas bstan
T02D1229:38a-5: pas reg par bya ba de ni dbang bskur ba
T02D1229:38a-7: de kho na nyid gnyis pa'o //

T02D1229:38a-9: gsang sngags h'u% brjod nas bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i rnam par gyur pa dang /

T02D1229:38a-24: yan lag bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1229:38a-25: rnam par snang mdzad kyi cod pan can aargha dang /
T02D1229:38a-26: btung ba la sogs pa bstabs pa /

T02D1229:38a-28: dbus su phyogs skyod rang rang gi phyogs su gyur

T02D1229:38a-31: bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
T02D1229:38a-39: padma chen po rang gi phyogs kyi 'dab mar chud pa /
T02D1229:38a-40: lha ma yin dang bcas pa sa bon gyi yi
T02D1229:38a-41: ge aa yongs su gyur pa las mdog dmar po
T02D1229:38a-42: smar ba mtha' yas kyi cod pan can yin la
T02D1229:38a-43: / phyi ma snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1229:38a-46: bdud rtsi la sogs pa bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1229:38a-47: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1229:38a-48: yam las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor du ba'i mdog can gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu dang /
T02D1229:38a-49: de'i steng du ram las gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po //
T02D1229:38b-0: @38b de'i steng du yi ge aa yongs su gyur
T02D1229:38b-1: pa'i padma'i snod bza' ba la sogs pas bkang ba
T02D1229:38b-2: / sa bon lngas byin gyis brlabs pa /

T02D1229:38b-23: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /

T02D1229:38b-27: aa nu rakto me bha ba /

T02D1229:38b-40: gsum gyi dbus kyi padma dmar po la gong du

T02D1229:38b-42: la sogs pas bkug la yud tsam gyis sngar bsgrubs
T02D1229:38b-43: pa'i gtor ma dang dbang po la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1229:38b-44: kyis tshim par byas pa yin te /
T02D1229:38b-45: lhag ma snga ma bzhin no //

T02D1229:38b-48: // / da ni bzlas pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D1229:38b-49: ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du song ba'i rang gi

T02D1229:38b-51: cig skyes pa bsgom pa'i de ma thag rang gi
T02D1229:38b-52: lha dran pas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems
T02D1229:38b-53: dpa'i thugs gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um gi
T02D1229:38b-54: sa bon las nges par byung ba'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1229:39a-1: lus ngag yid du son nas dri ma ma lus par bkug nas /
T02D1229:39a-2: yang bdag nyid la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1229:39a-3: yang de bzhin du bltas te /
T02D1229:39a-4: rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas pa byas shing mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas ldang bar bya'o //
T02D1229:39a-5: gsang sngags bzlas pa ste de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o /
T02D1229:39a-7: // / dgar ba yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D1229:39a-8: bstan pa la gnod par byed pa dang /
T02D1229:39a-9: bla ma dang sangs rgyas bslus pa dang /
T02D1229:39a-10: pha dang ma gsod pa la 'chel ba mthong na
T02D1229:39a-11: gzhan gyi las dge ba dang mi dge ba mngon
T02D1229:39a-12: par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yod pa'i rnal
T02D1229:39a-13: 'byor pas snying brtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
T02D1229:39a-14: sbyin pa dang gus pa la sogs pas don du
T02D1229:39a-15: gnyer ba na bdag nyid ngan par byed na yang
T02D1229:39a-16: de bzhin du las byed na yang dang yang du
T02D1229:39a-17: gnyer bar bya'o // gal te tshig mi nyan na
T02D1229:39a-18: de'i tshe brtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis dpal
T02D1229:39a-19: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gsungs pa'i cho ga drag
T02D1229:39a-21: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D1229:39a-22: dus mtshams su ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sbyor ba
T02D1229:39a-23: dang ldan pas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa
T02D1229:39a-24: bon las 'od zer 'phros pas sangs rgyas dpag tu
T02D1229:39a-25: med pa spyan drangs te de rnams kyi spyan sngar
T02D1229:39a-26: de lta bu'i las byed pa'i bsgrub bya la bltas
T02D1229:39a-27: nas sangs rgyas rnams la bsgrags par bya'o //
T02D1229:39a-28: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D1229:39a-31: bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D1229:39a-32: thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis rang gi
T02D1229:39a-33: 'khor lo'i gtso bo spyan drangs la /
T02D1229:39a-34: rdo rje'i lam las padmar zhu bar gyur pa las
T02D1229:39a-35: zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang tho ba thogs pa'i
T02D1229:39a-36: goo r'i'i gzugs su 'byung bar blta'o //
T02D1229:39a-37: goo r'i de rang gi 'od zer rdo rje gzugs
T02D1229:39a-38: su spros pas bsgrub bya de'i sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D1229:39a-39: la sogs pa bsal nas zhags pas bcings shing lcags
T02D1229:39a-40: kyus drangs nas 'khor lo'i mdun du bkug la /
T02D1229:39a-41: rnal 'byor pa des ye shes sems dpa' de la /
T02D1229:39a-42: bdag ni ngo bo'i dbang dang ni //
T02D1229:39a-43: mi bskyod ngo bo la chags pas //
T02D1229:39a-44: smad pa'i las rnams kun 'byung ba'o //
T02D1229:39a-45: lus 'di khyod kyis spang bya zhes //
T02D1229:39b-0: @39b don du gnyer ba byas nas ni //
T02D1229:39b-1: goo r'i lcags kyu zhags pa yis //
T02D1229:39b-2: ye shes sems dpa' nges phyung nas //
T02D1229:39b-3: goo r'i'i lag pa'i lcags kyu yis //
T02D1229:39b-4: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba nas //
T02D1229:39b-5: rgyu ma ma lus drangs nas ni //
T02D1229:39b-6: dka' thub can gyis de ma thag / drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1229:39b-8: dud 'gro'i gzugs su bltas nas ni //
T02D1229:39b-9: spyi 'greng kha nas khrag skyug pa /
T02D1229:39b-10: 'dar ba skyabs med pa til mar gyis byugs pa /
T02D1229:39b-12: skra gyen du brjes pa de'i lam la me khab kyi gzugs can rab tu zhugs par bsams la /
T02D1229:39b-13: snying gar me'i sa bon bsams nas de ma thag tu bsgral bar bya'o //
T02D1229:39b-14: ye shes sems dpa' yang mi bskyod par bsgrubs la
T02D1229:39b-15: cho ga'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod
T02D1229:39b-16: pa dang / bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba

T02D1229:39b-18: pa dang / blta bar bya'o // dgar ba'i de kho na nyid de lnga pa'o /
T02D1229:39b-20: // / de ni bsgom pa'i phyir bzlog pa bstan par bya ste /

T02D1229:39b-24: 'od 'phro ba'i gzugs can dbang bskur ba la sogs pa blangs la /

T02D1229:39b-32: aom pra tyam ge ra badzra aushni sha /

T02D1229:40a-7: che ge mo raksham ku ru h'u% phat /
T02D1229:40a-8: nub kyi rtsibs la na ma:sa manta buddhe bhyo //

T02D1229:40a-18: dbang ldan la na ma:sa manta buddhe bhyo /

T02D1229:40a-41: rlung gi phyogs la na ma:sa manta buddhe bhyo /

T02D1229:40a-44: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /

T02D1229:40a-68: tsitta kri tam ta ta sarbantu tstshinda tstshinda /

T02D1229:40a-75: bdag bsrung ba'i sbyor ba 'dis 'khrul 'khor dang sngags la sogs pa 'jig par byed pa yin te /
T02D1229:40a-76: srung ba'i 'khor lo byas pa dpung pa la btags
T02D1229:40a-77: na khams gsum pos zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur
T02D1229:40a-78: ro // bris pa'i phyir bzlog pa ste /
T02D1229:40a-79: de kho na nyid bdun pa'o /
T02D1229:40b-0: // / de ma thag tu dkyil 'khor @40b gyi sgrub pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1229:40b-1: sngags pa nub tu kha bltas nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1229:40b-2: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od
T02D1229:40b-3: zer gyis nam mkha' la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor drangs
T02D1229:40b-4: nas rang gi rig ma'i padma la zhugs par gyur
T02D1229:40b-5: par bsam mo // zhu ba de las rang gi
T02D1229:40b-6: sa bon gyis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor
T02D1229:40b-7: lo'i gtso bo la sogs pa go rims bzhin du
T02D1229:40b-8: par bsam mo // spro bar bya'o // de'i 'og
T02D1229:40b-9: tu mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la mchod
T02D1229:40b-11: bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya'o //
T02D1229:40b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa ste de kho na nyid brgyad pa'o /
T02D1229:40b-14: // / da ni bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1229:40b-15: rnal 'byor pa'i sems bsgom pa la cung zhig brtan
T02D1229:40b-16: por gyur cing mtshan ma cung zhig rnyed par gyur
T02D1229:40b-17: pas zla ba drug gi bar du bsgom par bya'o
T02D1229:40b-18: // de lta na yang gal te ma grub na
T02D1229:40b-19: de'i tshe rang gi 'dod pa'i lha nyid kyi rnal
T02D1229:40b-20: 'byor sngon du 'gro ba can gyi ji skad brjod
T02D1229:40b-21: pa'i cho ga dam tshig la sogs pa sngon du
T02D1229:40b-22: 'gro bas zla ba bco brgyad bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1229:40b-23: de lta na yang grub par ma gyur to zhe na /
T02D1229:40b-24: de'i tshe thun mtshams rnams su bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1229:40b-25: de la rim pa ni 'di yin no //
T02D1229:40b-26: mi bskyod pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ba ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa /
T02D1229:40b-27: dkyil 'khor nag pos yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1229:40b-28: gzhal yas khang nag por gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D1229:40b-29: de'i 'og tu mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D1229:40b-30: bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D1229:40b-31: thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin
T02D1229:40b-32: gshegs pa'i 'khor lo spyan drangs te padma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1229:40b-33: du lhung bar gyur pa me'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs
T02D1229:40b-34: su bskor ba / 'jigs shing skrag la rab tu 'dar bar gyur pa bltas la ;
T02D1229:40b-35: de'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D1229:40b-36: pa'i tshogs shes rab la chags pas zhu bar gyur
T02D1229:40b-37: pa rdo rje'i lam nas byung ba yongs su gyur
T02D1229:40b-38: pa las gshin rje gshed phyag gnyis pas phyogs brgyad
T02D1229:40b-39: nas aom a'a:badzra r'a dza aaksho bhya k'i la ya
T02D1229:41a-0: h'um phat ces bya bas phur @41a * //
T02D1229:41a-2: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i cho ga yin no //
T02D1229:41a-3: de dag thams cad la gdab par bya ba dang /
T02D1229:41a-5: 'debs par byed par mngon par zhen pa med pas
T02D1229:41a-6: byas na 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma
T02D1229:41a-7: yin no // bsdigs pa'i sgrub pa ste de kho na nyid dgu pa'o /
T02D1229:41a-9: // / de'i 'og tu gshegs su gsol pa bstan par bya ste /
T02D1229:41a-10: de la rim pa ni 'di yin no //
T02D1229:41a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa las byung la zhi ba'i
T02D1229:41a-12: sbyin sreg byas nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par
T02D1229:41a-13: zhugs nas mchod pa sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod
T02D1229:41a-14: pa byas nas spos dang bcas pa'i dril bu dkrol
T02D1229:41a-15: la // aom khyed kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
T02D1229:41a-16: rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsol //
T02D1229:41a-17: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D1229:41a-18: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1229:41a-19: mu: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod la /
T02D1229:41a-20: de'i 'og tu sa tshon gyi dkyil 'khor las bskyed
T02D1229:41a-21: de dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D1229:41a-23: yi ge gsum mu:'i mtha' can gyis dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1229:41a-24: sa tshon phyags la dri zhim po'i snod du bcug
T02D1229:41a-25: la / rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la dor bar bya'o//
T02D1229:41a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi sa ba byung gis byugs shing yi
T02D1229:41a-27: ge mu:'i mtha' can gyi cho gas bsang gtor byas
T02D1229:41a-28: la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1229:41a-29: gshegs su gsol ba'i de kho na nyid de bcu pa'o //
T02D1229:41a-30: de nyid bcu pa nges byas las /
T02D1229:41a-31: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags pa //
T02D1229:41a-32: des ni 'gro ba mi shes pa'i //
T02D1229:41a-33: rab rib rnams ni zhi 'gyur shog / slob dpon
T02D1229:41a-34: dombi pas mdzad pa'i de kho na nyid bcu pa
T02D1229:41a-36: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas dang /
T02D1229:41a-37: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i
